title: "Can machine learning predict BMI in early childhood using data from their first 1000 days of life?"
excerpt: "In a recent study published in the Scientific Reports Journal, researchers used a machine learning (ML)-based approach to predict adulthood obesity by assessing risk factors and tracking body mass index (BMI) values in the initial 1,000 days (between two and four years of age) of life."
